title: What Does the 🗑️ (Trash Can) Emoji Mean?

steps.title: The 🗑️ emoji represents a basket for disposing of trash.
steps.content: The 🗑️ emoji represents a basket for disposing of trash. Also known as the wastepaper basket emoji, 🗑️ symbolizes a trash container. Use it to talk about literal or figurative garbage, whether it’s old receipts you have piling up in your purse or a situation that went poorly. [1] X Research source The trashcan emoji is also used to discuss basketball, especially since it looks like a basketball net.

steps.title: Use the 🗑️ emoji to refer to actual trash or rubbish.
steps.content: Use the 🗑️ emoji to refer to actual trash or rubbish. Do you have a bunch of garbage you need to throw away? Use 🗑️ to announce that you’re getting rid of it. If you’re cleaning your house or apartment , this emoji is another way of saying: it’s out with the old and in with the new! [2] X Research source “It’s time for spring cleaning 🗑️✨🧹🧤🫧🧽” “Just deleted 3,201 cringe photos of myself from middle school 🗑️” “Does anyone else have old homework sitting in their parent’s house? 🗑️”

steps.title: Express negative feelings with the 🗑️ emoji.
steps.content: Express negative feelings with the 🗑️ emoji. If you’re having a rough day, use 🗑️ to express your feelings . [3] X Research source A lot of people can probably relate to your experience, so it’s a great way to connect with others and show that you don’t take yourself too seriously. “Monday mood: 🗑️🗑️🗑️” “Feeling like trash today 🗑️” “My entire week has been 🗑️”

steps.title: Some people use 🗑️ emoji to talk about something they dislike.
steps.content: Some people use 🗑️ emoji to talk about something they dislike. Sometimes, people use the trashcan emoji as a clever way to say that a person, object, or idea is terrible. “Unpopular opinion: The Popeyes chicken sandwich is 🗑️” “His ex-girlfriend was trash 🗑️ She never tipped or said thank you 🚩🚩🚩” “The new collection is 🗑️ I can’t imagine anyone wearing those pieces in public…”

steps.title: Pair 🗑️ with the 🔥 (fire) emoji to represent a “dumpster fire.”
steps.content: Pair 🗑️ with the 🔥 (fire) emoji to represent a “dumpster fire.” This slang expression refers to a disastrous situation, especially in the world of sports. [4] X Research source Use this emoji combination to describe anything that’s unmanageable or out of control. “2020-2023 was an absolute 🗑️🔥” “It’s official…This season is a total 🗑️🔥⚾” “His speech gradually turned into a 🗑️🔥 Everyone was literally dying 💀🫣”

steps.title: Encourage people to be eco-friendly with the 🗑️ emoji.
steps.content: Encourage people to be eco-friendly with the 🗑️ emoji. Passionate about the planet? Use 🗑️ to talk about the harmful effects of littering and the toxic chemicals found in plastics. [5] X Research source By sharing this information, you might inspire people to go green and reduce their environmental footprint as much as possible! “PSA: Plastic straws pollute the planet 🗑️🥤❌ Just drink from the rim 🥛” “Be kind to Mother Earth 🌎 Don’t litter 🙅‍♀️🗑️ and don’t forget to recycle ♻️💚” “Just a reminder to avoid single-use plastics 🗑️🚯 and use a tote when shopping 👜🔄”

steps.title: Send 🗑️ with basketball-related emojis to discuss the game.
steps.content: Send 🗑️ with basketball-related emojis to discuss the game. A lot of people use the 🗑️ emoji to talk about basketball because it resembles a basketball net. Pair it with the basketball emoji as well as different colored heart emojis to represent your favorite team, or throw in the fire emoji to discuss a crazy play. [6] X Research source “Let’s go Lakers 🗑️🏀💜💛” “Lebron is the GOAT 🐐🏀🗑️🔥⛹🏿‍♂️” “My resolution is to land a half-court shot 🏀🗑️ Wish me luck 🤞🍀”

steps.title: Combine 🗑️ with other fun emojis to create a unique message.
steps.content: Combine 🗑️ with other fun emojis to create a unique message. Looking for a way to spice up your conversation ? Pair 🗑️ with different emojis to add more personality to your message. If you’re not sure what to send, here are a few examples to help you get started: 🗑️♻️🏞️💚🌱 = Happy Earth Day 🗑️🚿🧼🧴🧽✨ = Spring cleaning 🗑️💿🎵🎸= Horrible taste in music 🗑️👩‍💼💺🖥️⌨️🖱️ = Terrible work day 🗑️📺 = Not a fan of a specific TV show

steps.title: The 🗑️ (Trash Can) Emoji is a silver wire-mesh basket.
steps.content: The 🗑️ (Trash Can) Emoji is a silver wire-mesh basket. Unicode : U+1F5D1
